ShortDescription: ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services. By accessing our website or services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
WeCollect: We collect both personal and non-personal information to provide and improve our services.
ThisIncludesAnyInformation: This includes any information you voluntarily provide, such as:
Name: Name
AnyOtherInformation: Any other information submitted through our contact forms or communication channels
ThisIncludesAutomaticallyCollected: This includes automatically collected information such as:
PagesViewedAndTime: Pages viewed and time spent on our website
WeUseCollected: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
ToProvideAndManage: To provide and manage our services
ToCommunicateWithYou: To communicate with you about your inquiries or projects
ToProcessPaymentsAndManageBillings: To process payments and manage billing
ToImproveAndPersonalize: To improve and personalize your experience
ToAnalyzeAndOptimize: To analyze website usage and optimize performance
WeDoNotSellOrRentInformation: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following circumstances:
ServiceProviders: Service Providers: With trusted third-party vendors who assist us in providing our services, such as payment processors or hosting providers.
LegalCompliance: Legal Compliance: When required by law or to protect our rights and interests.
BusinessTransfers: Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your information may be transferred.
WeUseCookiesAndSimilarTrackingTechnologi: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us recognize you and improve website functionality. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling cookies may limit certain features of our website.
WeImplementAppropriateTechnical: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or destruction. However, no data transmission over the internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
DependingOnJurisdiction: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
AccessPersonalInformation: Access your personal information and request a copy
ObjectToProcessingOrRestrict: Object to processing or restrict processing of your information
WithdrawConsentWhereProcessing: Withdraw consent where processing is based on your consent
ToExerciseContactUsAt: To exercise these rights, contact us at
OurWebsiteMayContain: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites.
OurServicesAreNotDirected: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have inadvertently collected information from a child, please contact us to delete it.
WeMayUpdateThisPrivacyPolicy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Effective Date." Your continued use of our services after changes are made indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.
ForAnyQuestionOrConcernsContactUs: For any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at:
ThankYouForTrusting: Thank you for trusting Quant-Apps with your information.
